name: Urban War Defense
description: Lead through a action packed fast paced tower defense game with a story of an invasion on your homeland by a large foreign force and as a newly appointed commander do what you can to help your country fight back and defend against this enemy force which is approaching from the coast.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 460 or Radeon HD 3800 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Quad Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760+ or Radeon HD 6950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
